book.synopsis: Visiting the medieval stone castle of Baroness Geissler with Jonathan, Uncle Ned, and Senator Morton, Mandy investigates the mystery of its very old juniper that is sometimes said to jump
book.title_long: Mandie and the Jumping Juniper (Mandie, Book 18)
